original_text: Then they mounted four rows of precious stones on it. The first row was carnelian, chrysolite and beryl;
korean_text: 그것에 네 줄 보석을 물렸으니 곧 홍보석 황옥 녹주옥이 첫 줄이요

sentences.original_text: Then they mounted four rows of precious stones on it.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 그 위에 네 줄의 보석을 장식했습니다.

sentences.original_text: The first row was carnelian, chrysolite and beryl;
sentences.korean_translation: 첫 번째 줄은 홍옥, 감람석, 녹주석이었습니다;
